user.about: I am working as a  professional tattoo artist at Inkinn Studio Defence Colony. I started tattooing almost three years back in 2008. I loves doing the black and Grey tattoos and color tattoos. I loves giving the people a memory of a lifetime by inking them. I loves any and every kind of work. Please visit my website www.inkinn.com to know more and to see tattoos made by Me.

additional_info: Inkinn is one of the best tattoo studio in South Delhi which has something new and contemporary every time for tattoo enthusiasts. We know the art of intricate inking and proudly showcases several designs and styles. We have professional and experienced tattoo artist to providing unique and creative design for tattoo to customers and also according to their requirements.
